src_original: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
tgt_original: 盡諸十方世界尊　　普遊三世人師子

src_original: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ // 1 //
tgt_original: 我身口意具清淨　　是故今當遍稽首

src_original: kṣetrarajopamakāyapramāṇaiḥ sarvajināna karomi praṇāmam /  sarvajinābhimukhena manena bhadracarīpraṇidhānabalena // 2 //
tgt_original: 以普賢行諸願力　　一切最勝相現前 俯身量等剎土塵　　虔心卛禮於大聖

src_original: ekarajāgri rajopamabuddhā buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye /  (Gv 429)
tgt_original: 一微塵上眾塵佛　　各於其中佛子遶

src_original: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān // 4 //
tgt_original: 諸佛功德敷演故　　一切善願我當讚

src_original: puṣpavarebhi ca mālyavarebhirvādyavilepanachatravarebhiḥ /
tgt_original: 最勝妙華及花鬘　　最勝妙燈及鑪香

src_original: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi // 5 //
tgt_original: 音聲塗香及寶蓋　　恭敬供養一切佛

src_original: vastravarebhi ca gandhavarebhiścūrṇapuṭebhi ca merusamebhiḥ /
tgt_original: 勝妙衣服及薰香　　末香積裏等須彌

src_original: sarvaviśiṣṭaviyūhavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi // 6 //
tgt_original: 勝妙一切莊嚴具　　恭敬供養於善遊

src_original: yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /  bhadracarīadhimuktibalena vandami pūjayamī jina sarvān // 7 //
tgt_original: 深信普賢行願力　　如是無上廣大施 此皆將獻於十方　　恭敬供養一切佛

src_original: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
tgt_original: 為以貪嗔癡為因　　身業口業及意業

src_original: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /  buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam // 9 //
tgt_original: 及與眾生諸功德　　我當隨喜於一切

src_original: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṅgataprāptāḥ /
tgt_original: 十方諸界作燈者　　願證無著佛菩薩

src_original: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṃ cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai // 10 //
tgt_original: 如是於諸大導師　　我請轉於無上輪

src_original: ye 'pi ca nirvṛti darśitukāmāstānabhiyācami prāñjalibhūtaḥ /  (Gv 430)  kṣetrarajopamakalpa sthihantu sarvajagasya hitāya sukhāya // 11 //
tgt_original: 有佛欲取於涅槃　　為利一切有情故 我以合掌當跪請　　令願住劫剎土塵

src_original: vandanapūjanadeśanatāya modanadhyeṣaṇayācanatāya /
tgt_original: 禮拜供養與懺悔　　隨喜啟發及勸請

src_original: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam // 12 //
tgt_original: 我於積集少善根　　皆用迴向大菩提

src_original: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca ghriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
tgt_original: 過去十方諸善逝　　住於世者皆供養

src_original: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ // 13 //
tgt_original: 所有未來諸善逝　　速令願滿證菩提

src_original: yāvat keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
tgt_original: 盡於十方諸剎土　　皆得廣大令清淨

src_original: bodhidrumendragatebhi jinebhirbuddhasutebhi ca bhontu prapūrṇāḥ // 14 //
tgt_original: 菩薩樹下等覺尊　　及諸佛子願圓滿

src_original: yāvat keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ /
tgt_original: 所是十方有情類　　願得無漏常安樂

src_original: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā // 15 //
tgt_original: 所是眾生諸法義　　願所希望隨意成

src_original: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /  sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā // 16 //
tgt_original: 菩提諸行我當行　　願生六趣智宿命 若於世界受身時　　願我出家果恒遂

src_original: sarvajinānanuśikṣayamāṇo bhadracariṃ paripūrayamāṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 隨順修學諸最勝　　普賢行行令圓滿

src_original: śīlacariṃ vimalāṃ pariśuddhāṃ nityamakhaṇḍamacchidra careyam // 17 //
tgt_original: 無垢清淨尸羅等　　願常無缺無瑕穢

src_original: devarutebhi ca nāgarutebhiryakṣakumbhāṇḍamanuṣyarutebhiḥ /
tgt_original: 天龍夜叉鳩槃荼　　人及諸類發眾聲

src_original: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam // 18 //
tgt_original: 各各所有一切音　　我隨彼音為說法

src_original: ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam // 19 //  karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
tgt_original: 所有諸惡成障者　　如是皆願盡消滅 業與煩惱諸魔道　　行於世間得解脫

src_original: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ // 20 //
tgt_original: 不著於水喻蓮花　　經空無礙如日月

src_original: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /  sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu // 21 //
tgt_original: 所有十方剎土中　　惡趣眾苦盡消除 安致有情安樂處　　饒益諸行利群品

src_original: sattvacariṃ anuvartayamāno bodhicariṃ paripurayamāṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 能令圓滿菩提行　　隨順眾生轉彼行

src_original: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 22 //  ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
tgt_original: 開示普賢菩薩行　　盡未來劫行此行 熟能與我同行行　　願得與之常相隨

src_original: kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam // 23 //
tgt_original: 身業口業及意業　　與彼行行願為一

src_original: ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
tgt_original: 欲利於我諸善友　　開演普賢諸行者

src_original: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu // 24 //
tgt_original: 如是願得常相遇　　我不違背於彼意

src_original: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
tgt_original: 佛子圍繞大尊師　　願我常得親覩見

src_original: teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ // 25 //
tgt_original: 於中廣行大供養　　盡未來劫無厭惓

src_original: dhārayamāṇu jināna saddharmaṃ bodhicariṃ paridīpayamānaḥ /
tgt_original: 恒持諸佛最妙法　　菩薩之行令普示

src_original: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 26 //
tgt_original: 為淨普賢菩薩行　　於未來劫我願行

src_original: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /  prajñaupāyasamādhivimokṣaiḥ sarvaguṇairbhavi akṣayakośaḥ // 27 //
tgt_original: 於三有中輪轉時　　證得無盡福德智 定惠方便及解脫　　願成諸得無盡藏

src_original: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān /
tgt_original: 一微塵上微塵剎　　於一剎中無量佛

src_original: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ // 28 //
tgt_original: 佛子圍繞居中尊　　菩薩行行我瞻仰

src_original: buddhasamudra tha kṣetrasamudrānotari cārikakalpasamudrān // 29 //
tgt_original: 佛與剎土量如海　　行行如海眾多劫

src_original: ekasvarāṅgasamudrarutebhiḥ sarvajināna svarāṅgaviśuddhim /
tgt_original: 一音言枝方大海　　皆是諸佛清淨音

src_original: sarvajināna yathāśayaghoṣān buddhasarasvatimotari nityam // 30 //
tgt_original: 隨其眾意而敷演　　願我常趣諸佛教

src_original: teṣu ca akṣayaghoṣaruteṣu sarvatriyadhvagatāna jinānām /
tgt_original: 遊於三世諸最勝　　當轉無上法輪時

src_original: cakranayaṃ parivartayamāno buddhibalena ahaṃ praviśeyam // 31 //
tgt_original: 如上諸佛無盡教　　我以惠力令善入

src_original: ekakṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpapraveśa ahaṃ praviśeyam /
tgt_original: 所有未來眾多劫　　於一剎那我當證

src_original: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam // 32 //
tgt_original: 如是諸劫歷三世　　剎那分中我當行

src_original: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
tgt_original: 遊於三世人師子　　我於剎那盡瞻仰

src_original: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena // 33 //
tgt_original: 常於諸佛上境界　　如幻解脫力所證

src_original: ye ca triyadhvasukṣetraviyūhāstānabhinirhari ekarajāgre /  (Gv 433)
tgt_original: 三世剎土眾莊嚴　　盡用建立一塵上

src_original: evamaśeṣata sarvadiśāsu otari kṣetraviyūha jinānām // 34 //
tgt_original: 如是無量諸方所　　亦願佛剎遍莊嚴

src_original: ye ca ānāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
tgt_original: 所有未來諸世證　　盡證等覺轉法輪

src_original: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān // 35 //
tgt_original: 示入涅槃證真際　　我願行於諸佛前

src_original: ṛddhibalena samantajavena jñānabalena samantamukhena /  caryabalena samantaguṇena maitrabalena samantagatena // 36 //
tgt_original: 令諸神力速普往　　以大乘力趣普門 以行行力普功德　　諸大慈力普遍滿

src_original: puṇyabalena samantaśubhena jñānabalena asaṅgagatena /
tgt_original: 普於眾善諸福力　　無有染著大智力

src_original: prajñaupāyasamādhibalena bodhibalaṃ samudānayamānaḥ // 37 //
tgt_original: 智惠方便諸定力　　令正修行菩提力 常以清淨諸業力　　永除一切煩惱力 諸作魔力令無力　　圓滿普賢行行力

src_original: kṣetrasamudra viśodhayamānaḥ sattvasamudra vimocayamānaḥ /
tgt_original: 諸剎如海令諸淨　　有情諸海令解脫

src_original: dharmasamudra vipaśyayamāno jñānasamudra vigāhayamānaḥ // 39 //
tgt_original: 諸法如海令了見　　智惠如海令善證

src_original: caryasamudra viśodhayamānaḥ praṇidhisamudra prapūrayamāṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 行行如海令清淨　　誓願如海令圓滿

src_original: buddhasamudra prapūjayamānaḥ kalpasamudra careyamakhinnaḥ // 40 //
tgt_original: 諸佛如海令供養　　歷劫如海行無倦

src_original: ye ca triyadhvagatāna jinānāṃ bodhicaripraṇidhānaviśeṣāḥ /
tgt_original: 所遊三世最勝尊　　菩提行願有眾多

src_original: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣān bhadracarīya vibudhyiya bodhim // 41 //
tgt_original: 用普賢行等覺已　　如是我當令圓滿

src_original: (Gv 434)  jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /  tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 42 //
tgt_original: 諸佛子中最為尊　　是故號之為普賢 與此大智同行故　　如是諸善悉迴向

src_original: kāyatu vāca manasya viśuddhiścaryaviśuddhyatha kṣetraviśuddhiḥ /
tgt_original: 身口意業極清淨　　行淨眾剎亦清淨

src_original: yādṛśa nāmana bhadra vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena // 43 //  bhadracarīya samantaśubhāye mañjuśiripraṇidhāna careyam /
tgt_original: 普賢如何善迴向　　願我亦同於此行 為行極善普賢行　　文殊大願亦當行

src_original: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām // 44 //
tgt_original: 未來諸劫勿厭疲　　菩薩此行皆圓滿

src_original: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
tgt_original: 如是等行勿有量　　亦願諸福勿有量

src_original: apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām // 45 //
tgt_original: 處於如是無量行　　一切變化願我知

src_original: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
tgt_original: 若有盡於虛空際　　眾生無盡亦如是

src_original: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvataniṣṭha mama praṇidhānam // 46 //
tgt_original: 盡於業與煩惱際　　我之願際量亦然

src_original: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā rathaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
tgt_original: 所有十方無量剎　　眾寶莊嚴獻諸佛

src_original: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam // 47 //
tgt_original: 人及諸大最勝樂　　如剎塵劫將供養

src_original: yaśca imaṃ pariṇāmanarājaṃ śrutva sakṛjjanayedadhimuktim /  bodhivarāmanuprārthayamāno agru viśiṣṭa bhavedimu puṇyam // 48 //
tgt_original: 寧有聞此迴向經　　隨順深信大菩提 唯於此中生一信　　即成最勝功德聚

src_original: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
tgt_original: 若人發此普賢願　　此乃遠離諸惡趣

src_original: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracaripraṇidhānam // 49 //  (Gv 435)
tgt_original: 又以棄絕諸惡友　　是人速見阿彌陀

src_original: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣa janma /
tgt_original: 此皆獲證最勝壽　　善來於此壽人身

src_original: yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti // 50 //
tgt_original: 有如普賢大菩薩　　皆能不久速成就

src_original: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
tgt_original: 誰以無明力所作　　五無間等諸眾罪

src_original: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam // 51 //
tgt_original: 其人誦此普賢願　　應時速得永盡際

src_original: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirupetaḥ /
tgt_original: 於諸色相及智惠　　種族容質皆圓滿

src_original: tīrthikamāragaṇebhiraghṛṣyaḥ pūjitu bhoti sa sarvatriloke // 52 //
tgt_original: 眾魔外道不能屈　　道於三界咸供養

src_original: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
tgt_original: 為利一切有情故　　菩提樹下速安住

src_original: budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam // 53 //
tgt_original: 成等正覺轉法輪　　降伏一切魔軍眾

src_original: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
tgt_original: 若此普賢行行願　　受持讀誦解說者

src_original: buddha vijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha // 54 //
tgt_original: 此之果報唯佛知　　無上菩提勿生惑

src_original: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
tgt_original: 譬如文殊威德智　　普賢菩薩亦如是

src_original: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //
tgt_original: 我隨修學如彼行　　是等諸善悉迴向

src_original: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //
tgt_original: 遊於三世諸最勝　　所可稱讚所迴向 我之如是眾善根　　為修普賢行迴向

src_original: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
tgt_original: 若我當於命終時　　蠲除一切諸覆障

src_original: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //
tgt_original: 目所親覩彌陀己　　遊彼極樂剎土中
